snippet: Because of American pressure on companies to enforce export controls, some Apple employees have refused to sell to customers of Iranian descent.
abstract: Op-Ed article by Jamal Abdi, policy director at the National Iranian American Council, analyzes several reports of Apple employees refusing to sell to customers of Iranian decent; holds that the incidents are the result of flawed export controls against countries like Iran that are under sanctions; argues that when retail employees are left to interpret and implement such policies, racial profiling can result.

snippet: According to the PC industry’s main scorekeepers, IDC and Gartner, worldwide PC shipments fell 0.1 percent in the second quarter from a year ago.
abstract: According to the PC industry’s main scorekeepers, IDC and Gartner, worldwide PC shipments fell 0.1 percent in the second quarter from a year ago.

abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes detours taken by journalism school graduates and a look at why Apple never uses last names in its recruiting videos.

snippet: According to Republicans, Mitt Romney’s offshore investments are not just tax avoidance; they’re acts of patriotism.
abstract: According to Republicans, Mitt Romney’s offshore investments are not just tax avoidance; they’re acts of patriotism.

snippet: Group cleanses (generally one-to-five-day, all-liquid diets with anywhere from a half-dozen to as many as 150 employees taking part) are emerging as one of the latest ways to solidify corporate bonds.
abstract: Cleansing all-liquid diets for an employee group, with as many as 150 colleagues taking part, are emerging as one of the latest ways to solidify corporate bonds.

snippet: At Allen & Company's so-called summer camp for moguls, Timothy D. Cook's presence was noticed, particularly as Steve Jobs had usually been a no-show.
abstract: At Allen & Company's so-called summer camp for moguls, Timothy D. Cook's presence was noticed, particularly as Steve Jobs had usually been a no-show.

headline.main: Amid the Moguls, Apple's Cook Stands Out

snippet: Media moguls, technology titans and deal makers are meeting at the Allen & Company’s annual gathering, following a year of mixed initial public offerings and disruptions in the media industry.
abstract: Media moguls, technology titans and deal makers are meeting at the Allen & Company’s annual gathering, following a year of mixed initial public offerings and disruptions in the media industry.

headline.main: Uncertainty Looms Over Annual Sun Valley Gathering
headline.print_headline: In Sun Valley, Less Adulation of Tech Start-Ups

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AMY CHOZICK

snippet: As moguls descended on Sun Valley on Tuesday for Allen & Company's annual gathering, they were greeted by a giant plume of smoke.     Fanned by wind, wildfires in southern Idaho had spawned a huge cloud, obscuring the area's verdant hills and crea...
abstract: Cloud of uncertainty hangs over Allen & Co's annual tech conference in Sun Valley, Idaho, attended by technology and media moguls; many technology start-ups are attending, but after a year of mixed initial public offerings their golden glow has faded. Photos (M)1

headline.main: In Sun Valley, Less Adulation of Tech Start-Ups

byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and AMY CHOZICK
